trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_SEQ_00<tab>The Resistance has secured yet another outpost, and Dmitar would guide you there.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Dmitar at the western plateau.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>A Resistance rank of <var 20 E802 /var> is required to proceed with this quest.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_000<tab>Well come, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I see you've not been resting on your laurels since last we met.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_001<tab>We've secured a new outpost, and a barrier was erected over the site not long ago.

TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_002<tab>If you would follow me, I'll show you to our newest encampment. We've drawn perilously close to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var> now, so be on your guard.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_010<tab>We are but a stone's throw from the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>, much to the dismay of the IVth Legion, I would assume.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_011<tab>That their plans yet remain a mystery is concerning, but Master Garlond is confident in his countermeasures for any aerial assaults they may be plotting.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_012<tab>Victory is nearly at hand, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I can feel it!
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_DMITAR_000_013<tab>There is no telling what manner of magitek weaponry the IVth Legion will employ in their desperation, but I have faith we will prevail in the end.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The Resistance front line advances, allowing you to participate in new skirmishes and critical engagements.
TEXT_LUCKSA312_04093_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The next quest can be accepted by speaking with Bajsaljen after reaching Resistance rank <var 20 E802 /var> or higher.
